All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Alert
Custom alert dialog with styled appearance.
Card
Represents a playing card with a rank and suit.
CardImageLoader
Utility class for loading and caching card images.
Deck
Represents a deck of playing cards.
EmptyDeckException
Checked exception thrown when attempting to draw from an empty deck.
GameController
Main game controller that manages game logic and UI updates.
GameModel
Main game model that manages the game state, players, deck, and game logic.
GameStage
Main game stage that displays the game interface.
HumanPlayer
Represents a human player in the game.
InvalidCardPlayException
Checked exception thrown when an invalid card play is attempted.
MachinePlayer
Represents a machine (AI) player in the game.
Main
Main application class for Cincuentazo game.
Player
Abstract class representing a player in the Cincuentazo game.
PlayerEliminatedException
Unchecked exception thrown when a player is eliminated from the game.
Rank
Enum representing the ranks of playing cards.
Suit
Enum representing the four suits of a standard deck of cards.
WelcomeController
Controller for the welcome screen.
WelcomeStage
Stage for the welcome screen where players select game settings.
